thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Shiji Information Technology, Units in Strategic Agreement With Alibaba

title: BRIEF-Beijing Shiji Information Technology, Units in Strategic Agreement With Alibaba

organizations.name: beijing shiji information technology co ltd

text:
February 8, 2018 / 4:25 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Beijing Shiji Information Technology, Units in Strategic Agreement With Alibaba Reuters Staff 
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Beijing Shiji Information Technology Co Ltd: 
* SAYS IT AND UNITS SIGN STRATEGIC FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT WITH ALIBABA ON RETAIL-RELATED COOPERATIONS 
* SAYS UNIT PLANS TO SELL 38 PERCENT STAKE IN SHIJI RETAIL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY TO ALIBABA INVESTMENT LTD OR ITS RELATED PARTIES FOR $486 MILLION 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2GWRNYc ; bit.ly/2FUMY02 
Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
